channel.description: Chapter 1 RHCSA Notes - Installation About RHEL9 Kernel 5.14 Released May 2019 Built along side of Fedora 34 Installer program = Anaconda Default Bootloader = GRUB2 Default automatic partitioning = /boot, /, swap Default desktop environment = GNOME Installation Logs /root/anaconda-ks.cfg Configuration entered /var/log/anaconda/anaconda.log Contains informational, debug, and other general messages /var/log/anaconda/journal.log Stores messages generated by many services and components during system installation /var/log/anaconda/packaging.log Records messages generated by the dnf and rpm commands during software installation
